IdAffiliate.description: Affiliate ID generated automatically in the configuration. *
IdAffiliate.title: Id Affiliate

DateModified.description: Date when the item was updated *
DateModified.title: Date Modified

IsActive.description: Identifies whether the product is active or not. In case it is false, it means the product was deactivated in VTEX and should be blocked in the marketplace. We recommend that the inventory level is zeroed in the marketplace, and the product is blocked. In case the marketplace doesnt allow it to be deactivated, the product should be excluded, along with any existing correspondences in the connector. *
IsActive.title: Is Active

StockModified.description: Identifies that the inventory level has been altered. Connectors should send an Fulfillment Simulation request to collect updated information. *
StockModified.title: Stock Modified

PriceModified.description: Identifies that the price has been altered. Connectors should send an Fulfillment Simulation request to collect updated information. *
PriceModified.title: Price Modified

HasStockKeepingUnitModified.description: Identifies that the product/SKU registration data has changed, like name, description, weight, etc *
HasStockKeepingUnitModified.title: Has Stock Keeping Unit Modified

HasStockKeepingUnitRemovedFromAffiliate.description: Identifies that the product is no longer associated with the trade policy. In case the marketplace doesnt allow it to be deactivated, the product should be excluded, along with any existing correspondences in the connector. *
HasStockKeepingUnitRemovedFromAffiliate.title: Has Stock Keeping Unit Removed From Affiliate

errorPage.description: This page will be used when something goes wrong beyond section error-boundaries when rendering a page

firstByteThresholdMS.title: Global Async Rendering (Deprecated)
firstByteThresholdMS.description: Please disable this setting and enable each section individually. More info at https://deco.cx/en/blog/async-render-default

avoidRedirectingToEditor.title: Avoid redirecting to editor
avoidRedirectingToEditor.description: Disable going to editor when "." or "Ctrl + Shift + E" is pressed

disableProxy.title: Disable image/asset proxy for this site
disableProxy.description: Disable image/asset proxy for this site

whilelistURLs.title: Whilelist URL Patterns
whilelistURLs.description: Patterns that will be allowed to be proxied through images and assets (example: https://*.deco.cx/images/*). An empty array will allow all URLs.

d2Vic2l0ZS9mdW5jdGlvbnMvcmVxdWVzdFRvUGFy.title: Get params from request parameters
d2Vic2l0ZS9mdW5jdGlvbnMvcmVxdWVzdFRvUGFy.description: Set param to slug for routes of type /:slug

d2Vic2l0ZS9sb2FkZXJzL2FuYWx5dGljc1Njcmlw.title: Analytics Script Loader
d2Vic2l0ZS9sb2FkZXJzL2FuYWx5dGljc1Njcmlw.description: Fetches analytics script content from a remote URL

dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2FkZHJlc3MvZ2V0QWRkcmVz.title: Get Address by Postal Code
dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2FkZHJlc3MvZ2V0QWRkcmVz.description: Get an address by postal code

dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2FkZHJlc3MvZ2V0VXNlckFk.title: Get User Addresses
dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2FkZHJlc3MvZ2V0VXNlckFk.description: Get the addresses of the user logged in

dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2NhcnQudHM=.title: Get Cart
dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2NhcnQudHM=.description: Get the cart from the user logged in

dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2NvbmZpZy50cw==.title: Get Clients
dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2NvbmZpZy50cw==.description: Get the clients to use in the storefront

dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2ludGVsbGlnZW50U2VhcmNo.title: Product Details Page - Intelligent Search
dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2ludGVsbGlnZW50U2VhcmNo.description: List a product details page, with product and SEO data. commonly used for product pages.

dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2ludGVsbGlnZW50U2VhcmNo.title: Product List Intelligent Search
dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2ludGVsbGlnZW50U2VhcmNo.description: List a product list, commonly used for product shelves

dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2ludGVsbGlnZW50U2VhcmNo.title: Product Listing Page - Intelligent Search
dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2ludGVsbGlnZW50U2VhcmNo.description: List a product listing page, with products, filters, sort and SEO data, commonly used for category, search, brand and collection pages.

dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2ludGVsbGlnZW50U2VhcmNo.title: Suggestions Intelligent Search
dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2ludGVsbGlnZW50U2VhcmNo.description: List a product suggestion, with products and SEO data. commonly used for search suggestions and autocomplete.

dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2xlZ2FjeS9wYWdlVHlwZS50.title: Page Type
dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2xlZ2FjeS9wYWdlVHlwZS50.description: List a page type, used to pass a slug and get the page type. Like product, category, brand, collection, etc.

dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2xlZ2FjeS9wcm9kdWN0RGV0.title: Product Details Page Legacy
dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2xlZ2FjeS9wcm9kdWN0RGV0.description: List a product details page, with product and SEO data. commonly used for product pages.

dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2xlZ2FjeS9wcm9kdWN0TGlz.title: Product List Legacy
dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2xlZ2FjeS9wcm9kdWN0TGlz.description: List a product list, commonly used for product shelves

dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2xlZ2FjeS9wcm9kdWN0TGlz.title: Product Listing Page Legacy
dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2xlZ2FjeS9wcm9kdWN0TGlz.description: List a product listing page, with products, filters, sort and SEO data. commonly used for category, search, brand and collection pages.

dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2xlZ2FjeS9yZWxhdGVkUHJv.title: Related Products
dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2xlZ2FjeS9yZWxhdGVkUHJv.description: List related products, commonly used for additional shelves, features like: show similars or buy together.

dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2xlZ2FjeS9zdWdnZXN0aW9u.title: Suggestions Legacy
dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL2xlZ2FjeS9zdWdnZXN0aW9u.description: List suggestions, commonly used for search suggestions and autocomplete.

dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL29yZGVycy9vcmRlcnBsYWNl.description: Should be used on order placed page, the user must be authenticated or have access to the order through permissions or cookies

dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL3Nlc3Npb24vZ2V0VXNlclNl.description: Get the sessions of the user logged in

dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL3dpc2hsaXN0LnRz.description: Get the wishlist from the user logged in

dnRleC9sb2FkZXJzL3dvcmtmbG93L3Byb2R1Y3Qu.description: DO NOT USE this on the storefront

d2Vic2l0ZS9oYW5kbGVycy9wcm94eS50cw==.description: Proxies request to the target url.

d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9jb29raWUudHM=.title: Cookie
d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9jb29raWUudHM=.description: Target users that have a specific cookie

d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9jcm9uLnRz.title: Cron
d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9jcm9uLnRz.description: Target users with precision using recurring schedules

d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9kYXRlLnRz.title: Date and Time
d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9kYXRlLnRz.description: Target users based on specific dates or date ranges, including specific times

d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9kZXZpY2UudHM=.title: Device
d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9kZXZpY2UudHM=.description: Target users based on their device type, such as desktop, tablet, or mobile

d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9lbnZpcm9ubWVudC50.title: Environment
d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9lbnZpcm9ubWVudC50.description: Target users based from where they are accessing your site (development, testing, or production)

d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9ob3N0LnRz.title: Host
d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9ob3N0LnRz.description: Target users based on the domain or subdomain they are accessing your site from

d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9sb2NhdGlvbi50cw==.title: Location
d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9sb2NhdGlvbi50cw==.description: Target users based on their geographical location, such as country, city, or region

d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9tdWx0aS50cw==.title: Multi
d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9tdWx0aS50cw==.description: Create more complex conditions by combining multiple matchers

d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9uZWdhdGUudHM=.title: Negates
d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9uZWdhdGUudHM=.description: Create conditions that target users who do not meet certain criteria

d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9wYXRobmFtZS50cw==.title: Pathname
d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9wYXRobmFtZS50cw==.description: Target users based on the pathname

d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9yYW5kb20udHM=.title: Random
d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9yYW5kb20udHM=.description: Target a percentage of the total traffic to do an A/B test

d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9zaXRlLnRz.title: Site
d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy9zaXRlLnRz.description: Target users based on the deco website ID they are on

d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy91c2VyQWdlbnQudHM=.title: User Agent
d2Vic2l0ZS9tYXRjaGVycy91c2VyQWdlbnQudHM=.description: Target users based on their web browser or operational system

d2Vic2l0ZS9mbGFncy9hdWRpZW5jZS50cw==.title: Audience
d2Vic2l0ZS9mbGFncy9hdWRpZW5jZS50cw==.description: Select routes based on the matched audience.

d2Vic2l0ZS9mbGFncy9ldmVyeW9uZS50cw==.title: Audience Everyone
d2Vic2l0ZS9mbGFncy9ldmVyeW9uZS50cw==.description: Always match regardless of the current user

dnRleC9hY3Rpb25zL2F1dGhlbnRpY2F0aW9uL2Fj.description: Return authStatus that show if user is logged or something wrong happens.

dnRleC9hY3Rpb25zL2F1dGhlbnRpY2F0aW9uL2Ns.description: This function authenticates a user using their email and password.

dnRleC9hY3Rpb25zL2F1dGhlbnRpY2F0aW9uL3Jl.description: This function refreshes the VTEX authentication token using current session cookies.

dnRleC9hY3Rpb25zL2F1dGhlbnRpY2F0aW9uL3Nl.description: Sends an email verification request via VTEX API

dnRleC9hY3Rpb25zL2NhcnQvc2ltdWxhdGlvbi50.description: Simulate an orderForm, used for shipping and pricing simulation

dnRleC9hY3Rpb25zL2NhcnQvdXBkYXRlQXR0YWNo.description: Update an attachment in the cart

d29ya2Zsb3dzL2FjdGlvbnMvc3RhcnQudHM=.description: Start the workflow execution with the given props and args. You can set the id of the workflow as you wish.

c2l0ZS9hcHBzL2RlY28vYW5hbHl0aWNzLnRz.description: Measure your site traffic at a glance in a simple and modern web analytics dashboard.
